channel.title: How to make An Item be replaced with more than 1 other item
channel.description: I am trying to make my own little version of RuneCrafting but I am having one problem. I cannot figure out how to make [code]ReplaceItems(int,int);[/code] make the Item I want replaced be replaced with more than 1 other item. Ex. : I want level 1 rc'ers to get 1 nature rune per ess and level 5's to get 2 per ess, how to make it happen? Any help appreciated, thanks![br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2007, 04:19:19 PM[/size][hr]Anyone please? :)[br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2007, 07:07:09 PM[/size][hr]*yawn* Somebody knows.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2007, 07:22:23 PM[/size][hr]I KNOW SOMEBODY KNOWS!

item.title: How to make An Item be replaced with more than 1 other item
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

I am trying to make my own little version of RuneCrafting but I am having one problem. I cannot figure out how to make ReplaceItems(int,int); make the Item I want replaced be replaced with more than 1 other item. Ex. : I want level 1 rc’ers to get 1 nature rune per ess and level 5’s to get 2 per ess, how to make it happen? Any help appreciated, thanks![br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2007, 04:19:19 PM[/size][hr]Anyone please? :)[br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2007, 07:07:09 PM[/size][hr]yawn Somebody knows.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2007, 07:22:23 PM[/size][hr]I KNOW SOMEBODY KNOWS!
